attributes.action: Ban the use of the word 'racism' in all Goverment/Public language.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The words racist and racism have been hijacked by certain sectors of our society and have been used to ensure censorship of certain subjects that would not otherwise be tolerated.

The mere utterance of the word is enough to ruin lives and end careers with no trial, or right of appeal. The word is so 'loaded' that no sensible debate can take place without those involved being labelled, harrassed, their names being put on websites etc etc.

All debate on such issues as immigration, community relations and  religion etc has now become so 'sensitised' that by and large it doesn't take place!  The result of that is smouldering tension which will one day surface.

Britain is a country where freedom of speech has been fought for and earned as a right.  Increasingly that hard-won right is simply vanishing before our eyes!
